verbose_text: Thus, we decided to analyze the effect of hydroxylase inhibition in two cell line models with wild-type (wt) p53 expression, but divergent regulation : HeLa cells, in which p53 degradation is mediated by the E6 oncoprotein, and HepG2 cells, in which p53 stability is controlled by the action of MDM2.
evidence: p53 degradation is mediated by the E6
